Introduction

This lab has several goals:

  • To write a simple class.
  • To expose you to the style of documentation used for classes in the Java library.

Before you write any code, create a new project named project2 in your Eclipse workspace. Within it, create a package lab2. Consult the previous lab for a reminder on how to do this.

Then, go ahead and download the sample code for Basketball.java and put it in your lab2 package.

How do I get the Basketball code into my project?
You can do this in many different ways; here are a couple of options:
  • Download the file to a temporary location such as your Desktop. Find the src folder for your project in the Eclipse Package Explorer and in it find the lab2 package. Open up Windows Explorer, and drag the file from Windows Explorer into the lab2 package.
  • Or, create a new, empty class called Basketball in your lab2 package as we did in last week's lab, and copy and paste the Basketball code into it.
